Manx: Ayns foddeeaght dy ve ec shee
English: In longing to be at peace
Diplomatic: Ayns foddeeagh dy ve eck shee

Manx: Jeh’n seihll peccoil shoh ta mee skee
English: Of this sinful world I am tired
Diplomatic: Jeh’n seihll peccoil shoh ta mee skee

Manx: O, Dy beign ayns yn thalloo mie
English: O, If I were in the good earth
Diplomatic: O dy beiyn ayns yn thalloo mie

Manx: Marish ny nooghyn t’ec y thie
English: With the saints that are home
Diplomatic: Marish ny nooghyn t’eck y thie

Manx: As seyr veih peccah as dagh nhee
English: And free from sin and every thing
Diplomatic: As seyr veih peccah as dagh nhee

Manx: Ta cur souaigney er my chree
English: That causes distress to my heart.
Diplomatic: Ta chur souaigney er my chree

English: Who has opened the gates of paradise again.
